reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and comfortable, with one mentioning they were able to dance all night in it. The material receives positive feedback for being silky soft, feeling like butter on the skin, and being great quality. They appreciate its flattering design that shapes the body perfectly, and one customer notes it comes to the ankles. The dress is stretchy, with one review highlighting its elasticity in t

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Worth Every Penny
items.body: I am 5’11” and 165 lbs, and I ordered this dress in a size Large (Army Green). Let me just say—WOW. This dress checks every box! ✅ Length: It goes all the way to the ground, which is rare for my height—tall girl approved! ✅ Fabric: The material is silky, soft, and incredibly comfortable. It feels luxurious on the skin. ✅ Fit & Details: • Slips on easily over my head • Adjustable straps for the perfect fit • Ruching on the side with the slit to create a flattering, cinched look • Slit hits around mid-thigh, tasteful but sexy • Double fabric in the back adds beautiful flow and coverage I am absolutely impressed with the quality, the fit, and the comfort. For $50, this dress feels like a steal. I will definitely be ordering more colors! Note: this is literally just pulling it out of the package and putting it on. I will have to iron before actually wearing it out just FYI. Read more
items.author: Jamiek27

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY THE DRESS
items.body: LOVE the fabric, I am a size 8/10 about 5’3” and heavy on top. A medium fit perfect! Stretchy, looks classy, didn’t have to shorten the length. I received many compliments and felt comfortable dancing in it all night. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Party perfect
items.body: This dress was everything I hoped it would be! It fit like a glove, was incredibly comfortable, and made me feel sexy! I washed and dried it with no issues or shrinkage. The quality was also very good. Great price for what I got! Read more
items.author: Aimee Juneau

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it! 5’6 150lbs, hides the belly, very sexy but classy
items.body: It’s a yes, put it in the cart! Amazon can be a hit or miss when it comes to dresses, sorry Amazon! But this one is a must buy! It’s not too long, it’s a nice stretcher material, doesn’t appear cheap, very soft silky with stretch dress! I am 5’6 150lbs, I have a pouch that the dress hides well! Love love this dress! The slit is not too high, very sexy but classy! I’m wearing it for a work holiday party! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Incredible dress but light colors highlight sweat
items.body: TLDR; Do not buy a light color if you’re going to sweat!! Otherwise dress is a dream. I’m about 6’, 180 lbs. Ordered this dress as a Hail Mary for a wedding. The L fit perfectly, even with a little heel (I was surprised at the length!). The ruching is incredibly flattering, the dress itself is comfortable and the material is nice and thick. My only complaint - I bought in the light purple. I danced my little butt off and the sweat stains were PRESENT. Underboob, stomach - you name it. Big ole dark marks. They dried quick but just a heads up. Read more
items.author: Austin LaDuke

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for weddings
items.body: Beautiful dress the length was perfect. It fit very well and all the right places. It was a very breathable and wearable dress you could dress it up or down. I wore it to a wedding. The dress did not have any smell. It was a little wrinkle, but it came out once I ironed it. I got so many compliments at a wedding. The dress is beautiful. One thing I love about the material in the quality of the material is that it was thick enough to hide my underwear up under the dress. This is a must have beautiful wedding guest dress. Read more
items.author: Jasmine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the courthouse wedding or holiday party
items.body: Absolutely love! It is on the long side, but it falls nicely for the heels that I have. Honestly I probably could’ve gone with a medium instead of large(amazon recommended it). I am 5”0, 140 pounds, it looks and feels nice, the material doesn’t feel cheap, and I like how it is loose but hugs my body perfectly. Only thing I can complain about is the adjustable strap, sometimes it slides on its own and doesn’t stay secure to where I set it. Read more
items.author: Jasmine

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty!
items.body: It was very pretty but a little sheer. Definitely good for the money. Fit perfectly in length. Read more
items.author: Andrea

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Split One Shoulder High Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Split One Shoulder High Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Brown, Gold, Dark Navy, Grass Green, Army Green, Black, Champagne, Sage, Orange, Red, Rose Red, Wine Red, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
